meanings.sent1: Jake is a popular name for boys.
meanings.sent2: My friend's brother is named Jake.
meanings.sent3: Jake and his friends went to the park.
meanings.sent4: In the story, Jake was the hero who saved the day.
meanings.sent5: When Jake smiles, everyone feels happy.

meanings.definition: To do something easily or without effort.
meanings.sent1: He can jake the math problems quickly.
meanings.sent2: She always jakes her homework in no time.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could jake my chores as effortlessly as he does.
meanings.sent4: The magician seemed to jake the trick effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: With practice, you can jake the dance routine perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The car looked jake after the wash.
meanings.sent2: The house was jake and ready for the party.
meanings.sent3: Even after the game, his hair remained jake.
meanings.sent4: Her presentation was jake, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The garden appeared jake under the morning sun.
